casebody.data:
FRIENDS OF CROOKED CREEK, L.L.C.; Mark Bertrand; Donna Bertrand ; Sylvia T. Terry; Robert F. Zahn; and Michelle R. Zahn
v.
C.C. PARTNERS, INC. and Crooked Creek Golf Land LLC No. 286P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Mr. Matthew D. Quinn, Attorney at Law, For Friends of Crooked Creek, L.L.C., et al. Ms. Jamie S. Schwedler, Attorney at Law, For C.C. Partners, Inc., et al. Mr. Michael Joseph Crook, Attorney at Law, For C.C. Partners, Inc., et al. Mr. Russell B. Killen, Attorney at Law, For C.C. Partners, Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd of August 2017 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
